definition: (of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: In the late summer, the rivers swell and often burst their banks.
sentences.chinese: 夏末，河流漲水，常常沖決河岸。
